text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Currency" means currency and coin of the United States or any other country.
"Department" means the Department of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation.

section.section: "Financial institution" does not include any person licensed by the Commissioner under Title 11 of this article.

text.section: "Person" means an individual, partnership, firm, trust, estate, association, corporation, or other entity.
"Secretary" means the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation.
"Transaction" includes the deposit, withdrawal, transfer, bailment, loan, pledge payment, or exchange of currency by, through, or to the financial institution.
